attributes.action: Instruct the police to investigate the systematic obtaining of money by deception by MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: who have been claiming expenses they are not entitled to and if evidence is found of false accountig or obtaining money by deception arrest and prosecute those who have committed or conspired to commit these offences

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
